Translations.Text: walaw anna ahla l-kitabi amanu wa-ittaqaw lakaffarna ʿanhum sayyiatihim wala-adkhalnahum jannati l-naʿimi
walaw annahum aqamu l-tawrata wal-injila wama unzila ilayhim min rabbihim la-akalu min fawqihim wamin tahti arjulihim min'hum ummatun muq'tasidatun wakathirun min'hum saa ma yaʿmaluna
yaayyuha l-rasulu balligh ma unzila ilayka min rabbika wa-in lam tafʿal fama ballaghta risalatahu wal-lahu yaʿsimuka mina l-nasi inna l-laha la yahdi l-qawma l-kafirina

qul yaahla l-kitabi lastum ʿala shayin hatta tuqimu l-tawrata wal-injila wama unzila ilaykum min rabbikum walayazidanna kathiran min'hum ma unzila ilayka min rabbika tugh'yanan wakuf'ran fala tasa ʿala l-qawmi l-kafirina
inna alladhina amanu wa-alladhina hadu wal-sabiuna wal-nasara man amana bil-lahi wal-yawmi l-akhiri waʿamila salihan fala khawfun ʿalayhim wala hum yahzanuna
laqad akhadhna mithaqa bani is'raila wa-arsalna ilayhim rusulan kullama jaahum rasulun bima la tahwa anfusuhum fariqan kadhabu wafariqan yaqtuluna
